quest.name: Craft, Craft, Fashion, Baby
journal:
Where does the future of fashion lie? Inquiring Loporrits─Managingway among them─wish to know.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the restless Loporrit in the Carrotorium.
Deliver the requested item to Managingway.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: This may come as a shock to you, Forename, but it seems our Ways have developed an insatiable interest in clothing!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Is this not a remarkable achievement of individuality? Why, we have always worn identical garb for as long as I can remember.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Yet as we speak, one of our Ways is busy gathering a range of materials with which to make fashion. I was hoping you might assist them─they asked for you by name, after all. You'll find them in the Carrotorium.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: O-Oh! How wonderful to see you again. D-Do you remember me? I was the one who made you and your friends outfits when you first arrived! Um...I-I've practiced quite a lot since then!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: I'm still in the process of gathering supplies, but I thought that maybe...you could craft something for us?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Thank you for your help the other day! Everyone really liked what you made, so maybe...you could craft something for us again?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: I was thinking something shiny and impressive, like a buckle. Buckles are “in,” right? I have these materials to work with. L-Let me know if you need more.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: I was thinking a “chic” accessory might be nice. Did I use that word right? I have these materials to work with. L-Let me know if you need more.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: I was thinking something glittery that will make the fabric sparkle. Is that hard to do? I have these materials to work with. L-Let me know if you need more.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: When you're done, I'd like you to go and show Managingway what you made. I'll be thinking up “trendy” new designs, if you need anything.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Hi! Did you need something? No? Okay.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Hi! Did you need something? No? Okay.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Hi! Did you need something? No? Okay.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Oh, you've run out of material! It is sort of tricky to twist the thing, isn't it? A-Anyway, here you are.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Oh, you've run out of material! Um, I don't really know what “chic” means, so I'll leave it to you, okay? A-Anyway, here you are.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Oh, you've run out of material! No such thing as too glittery, right? A-Anyway, here you are.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: How goes the fashion creation?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: My, how daring! I do believe I would enjoy wearing something like this myself.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: I wonder what sort of outfit this will help create. The possibilities seem endless when one stops to consider them.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: That Way is both hardworking and determined, so I have no doubt their journey upon the road of fashion will be long and fruitful. I do hope you will lend them your expertise again!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
